使用在线编辑器编辑solidity代码：
https://ethereum.github.io/browser-solidity <br>
编译后再contract/web3 deploy中拷贝js代码,复制并放入到hello项目hello.js中

运行私链,在根目录下执行：<br>
1.解锁账户
```cmd
> personal.unlockAccount(eth.accounts[0])
Unlock account 0x4bad3053d574cd54513babe21db3f09bea1d387d
Passphrase: 
true
```

2.加载js文件
```cmd
> loadScript("./contracts/hello/hello.js")
INFO [09-14|13:02:08] Submitted contract creation              fullhash=0xbd56da4b4f5fd1cc83511fb59f4c40c62bad436596e26e8c7f19d6c8175c04d1 contract=0xe5131431f134a961c5cf3941ef77182aea203196
null [object Object]
true
```

3.挖矿
```bash
Contract mined! address: 0xe5131431f134a961c5cf3941ef77182aea203196 transactionHash: 0xbd56da4b4f5fd1cc83511fb59f4c40c62bad436596e26e8c7f19d6c8175c04d1
```

会得到:<br>
transactionHash 交易hash:<br>
0xbd56da4b4f5fd1cc83511fb59f4c40c62bad436596e26e8c7f19d6c8175c04d1<br>
contract 合约地址:<br>
0xe5131431f134a961c5cf3941ef77182aea203196<br>

根据transaction hash查询该transaction:
```cmd
> eth.getTransaction("0xbd56da4b4f5fd1cc83511fb59f4c40c62bad436596e26e8c7f19d6c8175c04d1")
{
  blockHash: "0x169b820092e151846e476a11c30cbc6d46b5a40ac3efe2bc223d4dee5d2638cb",
  blockNumber: 29,
  from: "0x4bad3053d574cd54513babe21db3f09bea1d387d",
  gas: 1000000,
  gasPrice: 1,
  hash: "0xbd56da4b4f5fd1cc83511fb59f4c40c62bad436596e26e8c7f19d6c8175c04d1",
  input: "",
  nonce: 8,
  r: "0x7525c6ae0d0fa02c19ce0ca67d52cd3856d551c9b94fb34882326690b1a7e2db",
  s: "0xb27cfbb7117a8570d77d1924dec8c624528bcd4e6ed09024bbeadd7ae744821",
  to: null,
  transactionIndex: 0,
  v: "0x151",
  value: 0
}
```

在在线浏览器中，我们会看到interface:<br>
```cmd
[{"constant":false,"inputs":[],"name":"kill","outputs":[],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"constant":false,"inputs":[{"name":"_newgreeting","type":"string"}],"name":"setGreeting","outputs":[],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"function"},{"constant":true,"inputs":[],"name":"greet","outputs":[{"name":"","type":"string"}],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"constant":true,"inputs":[],"name":"getGreeting","outputs":[{"name":"","type":"string"}],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"view","type":"function"},{"inputs":[],"payable":false,"stateMutability":"nonpayable","type":"constructor"}]
```
对应到eth合约abi
